name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Query Engineer with 13+ years of experience in software design and development, specializing in performance optimization and distributed systems. Proficient in **C++**, database management, query execution, and data structures, leveraging strong knowledge of algorithms to solve complex problems efficiently. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-performance applications and analytics solutions.
Skilled in **AWS** and **Azure** for cloud deployment, with hands-on experience in building AI/ML-powered platforms that support real-time processing and predictive analytics. Proven track record in implementing change streams and CI/CD pipelines to enhance development workflows. Committed to mentoring junior developers and fostering a culture of collaboration and continuous improvement.
